WRITING.TEXT: Camera probably couldn't focus with that big gobbler you've got attached to your head.
Sad thing is your mom wrote that on your lunch and told you to do this, she needed some new material to use on her future unsuccessful son.
You asked your mom to use the computer after coloring time and she replied "after you pick up all the markers." Looks like someone's a smart little fella.
Your nose will get roasted enough this summer.
Judging from all the scabs on your face, you could play a game of connect the dots of blood on your pillow case that you probably never thought to wash.
You don't need a hat with brows that thick. Makes your facial hair look pathetic.
You look like the girl from the first Jurassic Park after the Brachiosaurus sneezes on her. Shame you'll have those snot marks forever.
You look the the annoying person that would protest... Then again your weight says otherwise.
